text:
running into a JS issue. Would appreciate any help.

I'm trying to reassign my variable `eventString` after the `setEventId()`  is fired from a trigger I have set.

So an example, I have setEventId() on a button. When the user clicks the button, a modal pops up. Depending on the modal, I want the `eventId`  variable to the value in the `setEventId()` function.
I want to be able to access that `eventId` value globally or outside of the function.
